pullrequest.title: Fix compiler error due to specified double type instead of btScalar in BulletUniversalJoint.cc on Apple LLVM version 5.1 (clang-503.0.38) (based on LLVM 3.4svn)

content.raw: In that case, I would propose that we decline this pull request in favor of the one for 3.0. We tend to merge forward, and we can avoid conflicts if we just make one pull request. Thanks for the quick work.
content.html: In that case, I would propose that we decline this pull request in favor of the one for 3.0. We tend to merge forward, and we can avoid conflicts if we just make one pull request. Thanks for the quick work.
